content: 4 row until work measures 20cm ending with a 4th row k4 *yfwd sl 1 ybk k3 repeat from * to last 5 sts 2nd pattern row yfwd sl 1 ybk k4 work 6 row garter stitch repeat last 4 row until work measures 20cm cast off work 6 row garter stitch cast off pebble wash cloth using 4 50mm needles cast on 42 sts diagonal wash cloth work 6 row garter stitch knit every row using 4 50mm needles cast on 50 sts 1st row knit work 6 row garter stitch knit every row 2nd row k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 1st row k4 *sl 1 k1 yo pass the slipped stitch over the 3rd row k3 *k2tog repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 k1 as well as the yo repeat from * to last 4 sts k4 4th row k3 *k1 pick up horizontal thread before next 2nd row k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 stitch and knit it repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 3rd row k5 *sl 1 k1 yo pass the slipped stitch over the repeat last 4 row until work measures 20cm k1 as well as the yo repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 work 6 row garter stitch 4th row k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 cast off repeat last 4 row until work measures 20cm ending with a 3rd pattern row tweed wash cloth work 6 row garter stitch using 4 50mm needles cast on 50 sts cast off work 6 row garter stitch knit every row 1st row k3 *k1 yfwd sl 1 purlwise ybk repeat from * to to make up - all cloths last 3 sts k3 sew in ends press lightly with a warm iron and a damp 2nd row k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 cloth 3rd row k3 *yfwd sl 1 purlwise ybk k1 repeat from * to last 3 sts k3 4th row k3 purl to last 3 sts k3 repeat last 4 row until work measures 20cm ending with a 3rd pattern row work 6 row garter stitch cast off
